λ-δ Bridge.rule: λ modifies δ-geodesics; δ fixes λ-frame compatibility.

λ-Φ Projection Module.rule: Projection must place λ into a valid semantic curvature class.

λ-Π Truth Bridge.rule: Π-stabilized curvature field gives λ-truth curvature profile.

λχ-Evolution.rule: dλ/dχ preserves torsion rank; curvature flows to stable minima.
